## Gesture class

Class for one gesture.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class Gesture 
```

## Constructors

|  Constructor | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [(constructor)(e, creatorWorkspace)](./blockly.gesture._constructor_.md) |  | Constructs a new instance of the <code>Gesture</code> class |

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [isEnding\_](./blockly.gesture.isending_.md) |  | boolean | Boolean used internally to break a cycle in disposal. |
|  [onMoveWrapper\_](./blockly.gesture.onmovewrapper_.md) |  | browserEvents.Data \| null | A handle to use to unbind a mouse move listener at the end of a drag. Opaque data returned from Blockly.bindEventWithChecks\_. |
|  [onUpWrapper\_](./blockly.gesture.onupwrapper_.md) |  | browserEvents.Data \| null | A handle to use to unbind a mouse up listener at the end of a drag. Opaque data returned from Blockly.bindEventWithChecks\_. |
|  [startWorkspace\_](./blockly.gesture.startworkspace_.md) |  | [WorkspaceSvg](./blockly.workspacesvg.md) \| null | The workspace that the gesture started on. There may be multiple workspaces on a page; this is more accurate than using Blockly.common.getMainWorkspace(). |

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [getCurrentDragger()](./blockly.gesture.getcurrentdragger.md) |  | Gets the current dragger if an item is being dragged. Null if nothing is being dragged. |
|  [inProgress()](./blockly.gesture.inprogress.md) | <code>static</code> | Is a drag or other gesture currently in progress on any workspace? |
